name: Enchiladas Casserole
author: Ramona Bess Blankenship
instructions: Brown meat and add onion, garlic cloves, vinegar, tomato juice, chili powder, salt and pepper. Mix well and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and cook for 20 minutes. Stir in flour and cook over low heat until thick. Remove and put in 2 quart dish. Put a layer of crackers, meat, cheese, etc. Bake at 350Â° for 20 to 25 minutes.
